name: at-recruitment
short_description: The project is aim at developing a web-based/mobile useable and central recruitment process system for Small business companies and is not specific to one company but will be a central database can be used by many companies. Concept of application is a SAAS(software as a service) so in future application will be groomed to be a central HRM and HRD activities centre feasible for any small company to be used by its staff/employees and HR department with higher management. Facilities includes creating vacancies, storing application data, testing candidate, certificates management, automatic suggestion system(Expert system), interview process initiation, scheduling interviews, storing interview results for the application, gathering research about candidate from different social media sites and hiring application. But this system did not finish here, but it also provide facility for hr to select candidate and add in his staff, and manage his payroll, incentives, assign objective, appraisal
summary: At-recruitment is a online modern java based solution
